properties.title: SENTINEL-5P+ INNOVATION - GLYRETRO (GLYoxal Retrievals from TROPOMI)
properties.description: Develop a scientific glyoxal (CHOCHO) tropospheric column product; Collect independent data sets in order to validate the satellite observations; Pave the way towards an operationalization of the developed S5p glyoxal product; Demonstrate the added-value of the S5p glyoxal product for the user community.
properties.osc:consortium: BELGIAN INSTITUTE OF SPACE AERONOMY (BIRA-IASB) (BE),UNIVERSITAET BREMEN (DE)
